overview: Amidst the neon nightlife and erotic electricity of Las Vegas, Showgirls rips the cover off of any kind of revue staged on the strip! Twin temptresses Joanna Storm and Stacey Donovan shine along side Nina Hartley and Eric Edwards in a lavish production. You'll go from center stage to backstage to the private offices and limos of moguls and millionaires as these gorgeous babes do what they do best!
tagline: The Erotic Event of the Decade!
title: Showgirls
